name: mocha-wrap
description: Fluent pluggable interface for easily wrapping `describe` and `it` blocks in Mocha tests.
author: Jordan Harband <ljharb@gmail.com>

scripts.tests-only: npm run --silent tape | faucet && npm run --silent mocha1 && npm run --silent mocha2 && npm run --silent mocha3
scripts.mocha: npm run --silent mocha:standard && npm run --silent mocha:only
scripts.mocha1.4: npm run --silent install:mocha1.4 && MOCHAv1=true npm run --silent mocha
scripts.mocha1.x: npm run --silent install:mocha1.x && MOCHAv1=true npm run --silent mocha
scripts.mocha2.0: npm run --silent install:mocha2.0 && npm run --silent mocha
scripts.mocha2.x: npm run --silent install:mocha2.x && npm run --silent mocha
scripts.mocha3.0: npm run --silent install:mocha3.0 && npm run --silent mocha
scripts.mocha3.x: npm run --silent install:mocha3.x && npm run --silent mocha
scripts.mocha1: npm run --silent mocha1.4 && npm run --silent mocha1.x
scripts.mocha2: npm run --silent mocha2.0 && npm run --silent mocha2.x
scripts.mocha3: npm run --silent mocha3.0 && npm run --silent mocha3.x
scripts.coverage: npm run --silent mocha3.0 && npm run --silent cover:clean && npm run --silent cover:tape && npm run --silent cover:mocha && npm run --silent cover:merge && npm run --silent cover:check
scripts.cover:check: istanbul check-coverage && echo 100% code coverage, achievement unlocked!
scripts.cover:mocha: npm run --silent cover:mocha:standard && npm run --silent cover:mocha:only
